thread.title: Summer Winds Resort Services Announces 2015 Grand Prize Sweepstakes Winner
thread.title_full: Summer Winds Resort Services Announces 2015 Grand Prize Sweepstakes Winner

author: Robert Vonch
title: Summer Winds Resort Services Announces 2015 Grand Prize Sweepstakes Winner
text:
Summer Winds Resort Services, LLC recently awarded Mrs. Tamara Manley of Dixon, Tennessee her choice of several different vehicles with a value up to $30,000. Mrs. Manley was chosen at random from approximately 500,000 entries as the Grand Prize Winner of the “Get in the Driver’s Seat” sweepstakes that she had previously entered at the Opry Mills Mall in Nashville, Tennessee. She chose a new Jeep Wrangler Rubicon as her prize. “It is my pleasure to award the Grand Prize to Mrs. Manley,” stated Mr. Pat Joyce, President and CEO of Summer Winds Resort Services. “The Summer Winds team travels the country every year attending hundreds of exhibitions and special events. Thousands of families will visit Branson each year on our vacation packages and our efforts tremendously contribute to the success of the Branson tourism industry. It gives me a real sense of satisfaction whenever we award the Grand Prize, because it represents the culmination of so much hard work by our team of valued employees," said Joyce.
The contest, a nationwide sweepstakes conducted at malls, fairs and events mostly throughout the Midwest and western US, ended on June 30, 2015. The winner is given the choice of either a car, boat, ATV or a motorcycle valued up to $30,000 or $10,000 cash. After the drawing, Pat Joyce contacted Mrs. Manley to notify her of her win.
Summer Winds Resort Services, LLC operates and sells boutique themed resorts. For over 25 years, the Summer Winds team has developed award-winning programs and luxury resorts that thousands of owners enjoy. With over 500 employees working across the country, Summer Winds Resort Services has become one of the fastest growing resort entities in the United States. one common goal: delivering a lifetime of exceptional vacation experiences to the owners in our resorts.
The next giveaway will occur in 2017. Visit http://www.choosebranson.com for details.
